entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023
